reviews.author: Sample Author
reviews.reviewText:
Put the long descriptive review text here. For paragraph breaks, put 
 . Remember to provide unique reviewId to every single review in a sequence. This is very important. Also, to add more reviews, put a comma after the next curly brace and then copy-paste from the beginning to end of this curly brace. Also, please remove the dummy movie names. It was for testing.
